translations: 千兆字节（gigabyte 的复数）；十亿位元组

sentences.sentence: You will need approximately 80 gigabytes (GB) of free disc space.
sentences.translation: 您需要大约80兆比特(GB)的可用硬盘空间。

sentences.sentence: Some larger development tools may require several gigabytes each.
sentences.translation: 某些大型开发工具可能要占用数GB的空间。

sentences.sentence: The new file nodes allow files which are Gigabytes in size to be processed.
sentences.translation: 新文件节点允许处理大小为千兆字节的文件。
